mapper.sql: id, pcomp_kind_id, name, avatar, is_deleted, created_time, created_by, modified_time, modified_by
mapper.select:
select
from pcomp_software where is_deleted = 0 order by modified_time desc

select
from pcomp_software where is_deleted = 0 and pcomp_kind_id in (select id from pcomp_kind where pcomp_title_id = '0000000000000000000000000000000000000000') order by created_time

select
from pcomp_software where is_deleted = 0 and pcomp_kind_id not in (select id from pcomp_kind where pcomp_title_id = '0000000000000000000000000000000000000000') order by created_time

select
,
from pcomp_software where pcomp_kind_id = #{pcomp_kind_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted = 0
select id from pcomp_software where pcomp_kind_id = #{pcomp_kind_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into pcomp_software
id,
pcomp_kind_id,
name,
avatar,
is_deleted,
created_time,
created_by,
modified_time,
modified_by,
introduction_short,
introduction,

mapper.update:
update pcomp_software
pcomp_kind_id = #{pcompKindId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
introduction_short = #{introductionShort,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pcomp_software set pcomp_kind_id = #{pcompKindId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introduction_short = #{introductionShort,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
